amendment.description: To make funds available for the United Nations Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights in Colombia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1987 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1987 proposed by Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S13344-13345; text: CR S13344) To make funds available for the United Nations Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights in Colombia.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1987 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1987 proposed by Senator Leahy.
